interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: UglyDolls
Review Date: 2019/10/05
Store: Kelly Clarkson  (Actor),     Nick Jonas  (Actor),     Kelly Asbury  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ["Unconventionality rules in UglyDolls, a musical adventure featuring the singing and acting voices of Kelly Clarkson, Nick Jonas, Janelle Monáe, Blake Shelton and Pitbull. In Uglyville, weird is celebrated, strange is special and beauty is embraced as more than simply meets the eye. When Moxy and the UglyDolls discover Perfection, a town where dolls are seen through a strict model of attractiveness, they confront what it means to be different, struggle with their desire to be loved, and ultimately discover that you don't have to be perfect to be amazing. Featuring original songs and an all-star cast including Wanda Sykes and Gabriel Iglesias, UglyDolls is “a movie you'll want to watch again, and again!” (Naz Perez, Fandango)Bonus Content:", 'Making UglyDolls', 'Making UglyDolls', 'Fun with the Cast of UglyDolls', 'Fun with the Cast of UglyDolls', 'Sing-Along Tease', 'Sing-Along Tease', 'Trailers', 'Trailers']
Average Rating: 4.6

reference_summary:
Dumbo
Herman Bing  (Actor),     Edward Brophy  (Actor),     Ben Sharpsteen  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    G    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles
["Let your spirits soar as you travel beyond the big top to Walt Disney's timeless classic! In celebration of this landmark film's 70th anniversary,", 'Dumbo', 'now includes a thrilling digital restoration and never-before-seen bonus features! When Mrs. Jumbo\'s little "Baby Mine" finally arrives, Dumbo and his oversized ears become the talk of the circus. With the help of his loyal best friend, Timothy Mouse, a magic feather and a ton of courage, Dumbo uses his sensational ears to soar to fame as the world\'s one and only flying elephant! Full of daring adventure, memorable characters, award-winning music and inspiring messages about the power of friendship and belief in yourself,', 'Dumbo', "will become a treasured part of your family's collection of classic movies."]

The Secret Life of Pets [DVD]
Louis C.K.  (Actor),     Eric Stonestreet  (Actor),     Chris Renaud  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
['Comedy superstars Louis C.K., Eric Stonestreet, and Kevin Hart make their animated feature-film debut that finally answers the question: what do your pets do when you\'re not home? When their owners leave for the day, pets from the building gossip with their friends, satisfy their sweet tooths, and throw outrageous parties. But when a pampered terrier (C.K.) and his unruly new "roommate" from the pound (Stonestreet) get lost in the urban jungle of New York City, they must put aside their differences to survive the epic journey back home.', 'Bonus Content:', 'The Humans That Brought You Pets', 'The Humans That Brought You Pets', 'Animals Can Talk: Meet the Actors', 'Animals Can Talk: Meet the Actors', 'All About the Pets', 'All About the Pets', 'Hairstylist to the Dogs', 'Hairstylist to the Dogs', 'The Best of Snowball', 'The Best of Snowball', '"Lovely Day" Lyric Video', '"Lovely Day" Lyric Video', 'Hot Dog Sing-Along', 'Hot Dog Sing-Along', 'Brian the Minion on Pets', 'Brian the Minion on Pets', 'Go-Pro: The Secret Life of Pets', 'Go-Pro: The Secret Life of Pets', 'Sing Trailer', 'Sing Trailer', 'Mini-Movies.', 'Mini-Movies.']

["The Secret Life of Pets 2 continues the story of Max (Patton Oswalt), Gidget (Jenny Slate), Snowball (Kevin Hart) and the rest of the gang as they take on new adventures and are pushed to find the courage to become their own heroes. ['*Five years after suffering a crushing defeat and staggering losses at the hands of the evil Thanos (Josh Brolin in a motion-capture performance), Iron Man (Robert Downey, Jr.), Captain America (Chris Evans), Thor (Chris Hemsworth), and the rest of the remaining Avengers join forces with allies new and old as they travel back in time to various points in the past in a desperate attempt to obtain the powerful Infinity Stones and put things right. Thrilling, critically acclaimed, blockbuster sequel also stars Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson and Jeremy Renner. Two-disc set. *Genre: Action & Adventure *Rated PG-13']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: The user continues to be passionate about classic animated films, particularly Disney, while also enjoying contemporary superhero movies and expanding their love for engaging family-friendly animated comedies.

- **Target Audience**: Focus remains on content suitable for children, appealing broadly to family demographics through uplifting narratives.

- **Content Type**: Prefers physical media formats like DVDs, valuing a diverse collection that combines classic animations with recent family-oriented adventures.

- **Review Positivity**: Consistently leaves positive reviews, showcasing a history of high ratings and enthusiastic endorsements for enriching family films.

- **Family Orientation**: Enjoys watching films with family, especially granddaughters, emphasizing joyful shared experiences.

- **Emotional Connection**: Seeks films that explore themes of friendship, courage, and self-acceptance, resonating well with families and children.

- **Frequency**: Balances revisiting beloved classics with exploring new titles, confirming a commitment to high-quality content. Recent interactions indicate a growing appreciation for animated musicals that convey messages of individuality and acceptance, reinforcing a desire for cinematic experiences that blend excitement with family values.

- **Review Trends**: Recent reviews reflect a consistent favorability towards joyful children's content, underlining a tendency to recommend films that are both fun and meaningful for young audiences.
